column5: thinking out loud... any interest in setting up an online calendar, to post meeting, derbys scheduled,etc,  i do this to track my work hours, (zero for two months, yahoo plan is working) its free w google, but you have to sign in for access, (what doesnt nowadays) maybe there is one out there being used but we dont know. ? i have an address, but process not completed., my plan would be to post info sent in, and somehow some one would post. second part would be how to allow read only access, just think out loud....tipwatcher, ssfc
